articles.content: From shoppers hoarding products to stores cutting hours and limiting customer capacity, the retail horrors of 2020 might seem like they're a relic of the past. But as the the pandemic has continued i… [+3991 chars]

articles.author: Charles Riley, CNN Business
articles.title: US becomes world's top exporter of liquified natural gas - CNN
articles.description: The United States is now the world's leading exporter of liquified natural gas as Europe's energy crisis and shortages in China send demand for American shipments soaring.

articles.title: Biden strongly considering Fed picks: Sarah Bloom Raskin, Lisa Cook, Philip Jefferson - The Washington Post
articles.description: Biden is strongly considering nominating Sarah Bloom Raskin as the Fed’s top banking cop, and Lisa Cook and Philip Jefferson to the Fed board, according to people familiar with the matter.
